name: Fiend Lord, Malaabit
damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, poison; nonmagic B/P/S attacks

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Slams or Psychic Blasts. If he hits one creature with two Slams target must make DC 18 Str save or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 23 (4d8+5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Psychic Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +10 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 22 (5d6+5) psychic.

actions.name: Travel the Planes (1/Day)
actions.desc: Transports himself to a different plane of existence. This works like plane shift spell except he can affect only himself and can’t use it to banish an unwilling creature.

reactions.name: Prescient Defense
reactions.desc: When a creature scores a critical hit vs. him the hit becomes a normal hit.

reactions.name: Tactical Foresight
reactions.desc: When he fails an attack roll he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

legendary_actions.name: Foretell Favor
legendary_actions.desc: Foretells fortune for one creature he can see within 30' of him. Target can roll a d6 and add the number rolled to the next attack roll or save it makes. Once he has used this legendary action on a creature he can’t use it on that creature again until he has used it on another creature.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: Up to his speed with o provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Pronounce Doom
legendary_actions.desc: Pronounces doom upon one creature he can see within 30' of him. Target: roll d6 and subtract the number rolled from the next attack roll or save it makes (DC 18 Cha negates). Once he has used this legendary action on a creature he can’t use it on that creature again until he has used it on another creature.

special_abilities.name: Three Heads
special_abilities.desc: Has three heads: Advantage on Wis (Perception) checks and on saves vs. being deafened stunned and knocked unconscious.

special_abilities.name: Reactive Precognition
special_abilities.desc: Gets two extra reactions that can be used only for Prescient Defense or Tactical Foresight.

special_abilities.name: Unquenchable Voice
special_abilities.desc: His voice can’t be quieted or silenced by any means.

special_abilities.name: Allegorical Apologue (Recharge 5–6)
special_abilities.desc: Recites a short moral story about animals choosing one of the following:Oracular Fortune Fable fills listeners’ minds with hope of future success. Each creature of his choice within 20' of him and that can hear him gains 10 (3d6) temp hp and has advantage on next attack roll ability check or save it makes before start of his next turn.Sins of the Past Brings forth a torrent of bad memories. Each creature of his choice within 20' of him and that can hear him: 35 (10d6) psychic and disadvantage on attack rolls ability checks and saves until start of Malaabit’s next turn (DC 18 Cha half damage and no disadvantage).
